title: The Townhall Weekend Journal for JUN-20-2014 FRI
description:
The Townhall Weekend Journal for JUN-20-2014 FRI


Friday, June 20, 2014


IRS Scandal Not Watergate...It's Worse!



Weekend Journal





Bill Bennett spoke with a man who served in Iraq: 
    Florida Congressman Ron DeSantis. 

Dennis Prager sought answers regarding the Iraq situation
    from military expert Max Boot. 

Bennett turned to Tom Jocelyn of LongWarJournal.org.

John Hinderacker of Powerline.com shared his concerns about the Obama
    IRS, and now, FBI scandal with Dennis Prager.

[As Daniel Henninger wriote: "The Watergate break-in was the professionals
   of the party in power going after the party professionals
     of the party out of power. 
       The IRS scandal is the party in power going after 
         the most average Americans imaginable."]

 Medved with Jason Riley, a member of the Wall Street Journal
    editorial board, has a new book,

      of continued dis-engagement from the American military.
